Class APDecoder

java.lang.Object
  anip.APDecoder

public class APDecoder
extends java.lang.Object

Decoder for AP-format video files.

Artturi Tilanterä

Field Detail

BLOCK_WIDTH

private static final int BLOCK_WIDTH

Width of a block. A block is a constant sized, square shaped sub-image the encoded image consists of.

SUMMARY OF BLOCKS: The frame, a single image that will be encoded, is split into constant-sized squares called master blocks. Master blocks consist of smaller squares called blocks. The changes between frames are handled in blocks while subsections of frame containing local palettes are handled with size of master blocks.

See Also:

FRAME_PALETTE_LENGTH

private static final int FRAME_PALETTE_LENGTH
Maximum colors in a frame when it is in indexed color mode (has a palette). 256 * color depth = 256 * 3 = 768.

The decoded frame as a 24-bit RGB image, type of an int array where data is coded in order java.awt.image.BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_RGB.

private boolean useRgbBuffer
Determines whether to use this.rgbBuffer instead of this.frameBuffer. Value true means yes.

private int widthInMasterBlocks
Width of the image in masterblocks.

heightInMasterBlocks

private int heightInMasterBlocks
Height of the image in masterblocks.

changedBlocks

private byte[] changedBlocks
Bytemap representing the blocks of the current frame. Size is this.widthInBlocks * this.heightInBlocks. Values are: 0 = block contains exactly the same pixel values as the block in the same position in the previous frame; 1 = block is different from the corresponding block in the previous frame.

previousChangedBlocks

private byte[] previousChangedBlocks
Same as this.changedBlocks, but for previous frame. Used by compressRegionChanges().

imagePalette

private short[] imagePalette
256 color RGB palette for the current frame.

blockPalette

private short[] blockPalette
16 color palette for the current masterblock. Values are indices of this.imagePalette.

blockPaletteRGB

private int[] blockPaletteRGB
16 color palette for the current masterblock in RGB fullcolor, all three components packed into one int.

hasChangingBlocks

private boolean hasChangingBlocks
Indicates whether the current masterblock has any sub-blocks that are marked to be changing.

changingQuarters

private boolean[] changingQuarters
Indicates which blocks of the masterblock are changing.

currentMasterBlock

private Bitmap currentMasterBlock
Small bitmap in indexed color, for encoding the current master block.

currentMasterBlockFullColor

private Bitmap currentMasterBlockFullColor
Small bitmap that contains image data of this.currentMasterBlock in RGB fullcolor.

blockFullColor

private Bitmap blockFullColor
Small bitmap in fullcolor, for encoding the current master block. NOTE: size of this bitmap is BLOCK_WIDTH * BLOCK_WIDTH. It represents a single quarter of the current master block.

nibbles

private byte[] nibbles
Array of 4-bit integers used in compressing the pixels of a masterblock.

compressedBlockLength

private int compressedBlockLength
Number of bytes actually used in this.compressedBlock.

getImage

public void getImage(Bitmap image)
              throws java.io.IOException
Decodes next frame and stores its contents to the bitmap given as a parameter. Image width and height must be according to values returned by methods getFrameWidth() and getFrameHeight(), and image depth must be 3.

Parameters:
image - the bitmap where the frame will be written to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

copyFullColorBlockDataToImage

private void copyFullColorBlockDataToImage(Bitmap image,
                                           int xCorner,
                                           int yCorner)
Copies fullcolor RGB image data from this.currentMasterBlockFullcolor to a fullcolor image.

Parameters:
image - image in 24-bit RGB fullcolor.
xCorner - the left edge of the block.
yCorner - the top edge of the block.

paintChangedRegionsOfMasterBlock

private void paintChangedRegionsOfMasterBlock(Bitmap image,
                                              int startBlockX,
                                              int startBlockY)
Copies fullcolor RGB image data from this.currentMasterBlockFullcolor to a fullcolor image, and only parts according to this.changedBlocks.

Parameters:
image - image in 24-bit RGB fullcolor.
startBlockX - offset in blocks (not masterblocks) from the left edge of the image.
startBlockY - offset in blocks (not masterblocks) from the top edge of the image.

convertToFullcolor

private void convertToFullcolor(Bitmap indexedImage,
                                Bitmap fullcolorImage)
Converts an indexed color image to 24-bit image.

Parameters:
indexedImage - image with 256 color indexed palette.
fullcolorImage - 24-bit image with pixel values RGB RGB ..
